promotions.title: Huge Bonus: Main Balance + Unlimited Internet 24/7!
promotions.title2: Huge Bonus: Main Balance + Unlimited Internet 24/7!
promotions.description:
* This promotion is carried out by Cubacel.
* This promotion is available from the 1st of November at 00:01 (Cuban time) until the 30th of November 2025 at 23:59 (Cuban time).
* For each recharge of 500 CUP,  the Cubacel customer receives Main Balance + Unlimited Internet 24/7.
* The Main Balance will expire 330 days after the top-up date.
* The unlimited data will expire 10 days after the recharge date. 
*  With the main/principal balance recharged, the receiver can: make national and international calls, purchase mailbag, packages, data plans, minutes, and SMS, and they can make transfers and activate the Amigo plan.
*   With the Main Balance you can also access the 3G Internet of Cubacel by activating the Consumer Rate (0.50CUP/MB for Internet and 0.25CUP/MB for Intranet).
*   In the case of customers who have valid vouchers of (Minutes, SMS and Data), the effective date of these vouchers will be extended.
*   When using the services of Cubacel, you first deduct the bonus and then the principal balance.
*   If a customer recharges more than once during the promotional period, the main balance and the bonus balance will be accumulated.
*   Main balance and bonus validity of the line can be checked through * 222# at no cost for a Cubacel customer.
*   Data packages: * 222* 328#
*   Voice, SMS and Data Bonus: * 222* 266#
*   Voice: * 222* 869#
*   SMS: * 222* 767#  
*   The top-up amount indicated on the recharge confirmation ticket does not show the bonus, although the phone will receive the promotional balance and a confirmation SMS.
*   If the person receiving the top-up has any questions, they can contact Cubacel Customer Service at +5352642266.
*   We have 24/7 support available to help the person sending the top-up during the recharge process, please contact our customer care team if you have any questions.
